description: Erection of a single storey rear extension and cycle store to the rear of no.91. Rebuilding of existing rear extension and construction of two cycle stores to the rear of no.93. Alteration and extension to existing timber fence. Installation of a lightweight canopy over the rear basement lightwells and waste storage to the rear of both properties. Installation of two rooflights in the front roof and automatic opening vent/rooflight in the rear roof slope of each property. Replacement of roof and windows. Installation of shopfront to no.91 and including new independent access to the upper floors and widening of the existing upper floor entrance in the shopfront of to no.93
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.
Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 100 P2, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 101 P1, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 141 P1, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 140 P1, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 142 P1, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 121 P1, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 122 P1, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 120 P1, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 150 P1, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 151 P2, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 152 P2, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 130 P3, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 131 P2, 23032-OA-XX-00-P-A 132 P2, Design and Access Statement, Energy Statement, Fire site plan, Fire design advice, Flood Risk Assessment, Environmental Noise Assessment, Planning Statement, SAP Calculation x4, BRUKL Output document - Notional, BRUKL Output document-proposed Received 17/04/2024].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans. Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.

Condition : 4 - The windows and automatic opening vent to be fitted on the roof face of the dwelling shall be black-framed and traditional, conservation-style.
Reason: In order to safeguard the architectural and historic interest of the [conservation area/listed building].

Condition : 5 - Secure covered cycle parking facilities (for not less than nine bicycles) for the occupants of, and visitors to, the development shall be installed in at the rear. The approved facilities shall conform to the current Westtrans West London Cycle Parking Guidance (or such other guidance as shall supersede it) in design and layout and be fully implemented and made available for use before the first occupation of the development or commencement of the approved use as appropriate and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction. 
Reason: In order to support sustainable transport objectives.
